Metadata.Title: CVE-2013-4342 affecting package xinetd for versions less than 2.3.15-14
Metadata.Description: CVE-2013-4342 affecting package xinetd for versions less than 2.3.15-14. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package xinetd is earlier than 2.3.15-14, affected by CVE-2013-4342
